sentences.english: Can be seen at the time, Chinese prickly ash as a tribute dedicated source of local officials and the court had.

sentences.english: The preparations of tables and fruit offerings are really time-consuming, why bother?

sentences.english: "I expect they're the tribute," she said.

sentences.english: A brahmin used to worship his Family Deity daily with food offerings.

sentences.english: They would use trolleys to carry the tributes.

definition: to offer tribute/to pay tribute that a vassal owes to his suzerain
to bestow/to confer (a reward for service)/a reward
